data.prayer: Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Saint Thomas Middle Island, Saint Kitts and Nevis that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Saint Thomas Middle Island, Saint Kitts and Nevis
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Saint Thomas Middle Island, Saint Kitts and Nevis.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Father, help the 572 believers in Saint Thomas Middle Island to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 2,027 lost friends and neighbors.
Father, encourage the 572 believers in Saint Thomas Middle Island to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Middle Island
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Middle Island, Saint Thomas Middle Island, Saint Kitts and Nevis.
Father, let your Word be a lamp to the feet of the 572 believers in Saint Thomas Middle Island, Saint Kitts and Nevis.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp to my feet and a light to my path.

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Saint Thomas Middle Island, Saint Kitts and Nevis the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.focus_label: Saint Thomas Middle Island, Saint Kitts and Nevis

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 2,600 souls living in the state of Saint Thomas Middle Island with a taste for your Word. Make it sweet as honey in their mouth.
data.verse: How sweet are your words to my taste, sweeter than honey to my mouth!

location.name: Saint Thomas Middle Island
location.full_name: Saint Thomas Middle Island, Saint Kitts and Nevis
